name: MonkeyLearn / Medallia Text Analytics
features: Omnichannel Analytics (Surveys, Social Media, Reviews, Emails, Conversations, Voice, etc.)

pricing.model: Subscription-based. API plan with monthly fee and query limits. Studio plan with custom pricing.

api_plan.notes: Starting price for API plan. May have overage fees or limitations. See Capterra and TrustRadius for details.

studio_plan.notes: Contact MonkeyLearn/Medallia for Studio plan pricing.

cons: Pricing can be considered high for startups
Information may be limited as MonkeyLearn is now part of Medallia

user_reviews.summary: Mixed reviews on pricing. User-friendly platform with good features, but can be expensive for startups. Requires further research from external review sites (G2, Capterra, TrustRadius) for detailed reviews of Medallia Text Analytics.

integration_capabilities: Integrates with various platforms and data sources (surveys, social media, etc.)
